name: Pokémon Moemon Emerald Version
storyline: The story in Moemon Emerald is pretty much the same as Pokemon Emerald. There might be some minor changes to the dialogue but everything else flows the same. The order of the game you play is the same so if you played Emerald, you already know what to do and where to go.
summary: Pokémon Moemon Emerald is a ROM hack based on the Emerald Version. What sets it apart from the original is the concept design.
